Hi all,
I want to crawl a big set of Domains using H3 and have many questio=
ns how to organize the jobs. The domains which have to crawl are generating=
 by user input. 

Is it possible to add seeds on the fly when the job is ru=
nning ? 

I see in the doku that there must be a .seeds file. 
https://weba=
rchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Action+Directory

But i can't find it=
 - The action directory is empty - (using ls -la).

Can i create this file =
and add only seeds into it. Should i add the seeds by changing the beans ? =
Is there a config needed to using the .seeds file ? Is it needed to pause t=
he job over the api ?

Maybe someone can give me some hints

Tom
